amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part H of House Report 116-438 to align state and federal truck weight limits for agricultural products in the State of Connecticut on interstate highways.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part H of House Report 116-438 to align state and federal truck weight limits for agricultural products in the State of Connecticut on interstate highways.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Courtney amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Courtney.
